author: kstam
msg: JUDDI-176, creating the derby files inside of the target directory to 'mvn clean' removes them

author: dreiss
msg: THRIFT-256. python: Fix inheritance of services in the same IDL file
The old version of type_name did not fully qualify parent service names
when they were defined in the same IDL file, but it is necessary because
they end up in different Python files.

author: dreiss
msg: THRIFT-310. python: Generate valid code for empty services

author: dreiss
msg: THRIFT-292. Install fb303.thrift in a more sensible location
thrift_home is the Thrift installation we are using.
We shouldn't be trying to install back into it.
